headline: Fortinet Launches Secure AI Data Center Solution to Protect Models, Data, and Infrastructure at Scale
summary: Featuring new ASIC-powered FortiGate 3800G and enhanced data and threat protection for LLMs, Fortinet delivers the industry’s first end-to-end security framework for AI data centersSUNNYVALE, Calif., Nov. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, today announced the Secure AI Data Center solution, the industry’s first end-to-end framework purpose-built to protect AI infrastructures.
